players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Diana: "I'm not convinced Alice is right. Let's investigate Bob first."
You: "I will investigate Bob as Alice suggested. I don't want to waste time if we can confirm the mafioso."
Bob: "I'm not the mafioso, I swear. Investigate Diana instead."
Diana: "I will investigate Bob as Alice suggested. I believe we should trust the investigation results and confirm if Bob is indeed the mafioso."
